post_title: WTT: several T206 including HOFer & rare backs
post_content:
Up for trade are 5 T206 cards:

Homerun Baker, Pied 350, PSA 2
Bob Spade, EPDG, SGC 1.5
Hooks Wiltse (throwing), American Beauty 350 no frame, GD
Tom Downey (fielding), American Beauty 350 with frame, GD (ink spot on front)
Bill Hinchman, Sweet Cap 150/30, GD
Lefty Leifield, Polar Bear, FR (ink spot on front)
Dode Paskert, Sweet Cap 350/25 FR

I’d love to get back cards with similar backs, ie, for the EPDG either an EPDG or Tolstoi; for the ABs, other ABs or Cycles, etc. 

I’m not picky on the players I get in return, as long as they are cards I don’t have. If interested in discussing, shoot me a PM. 

I’m putting together a binder set so condition isn’t important to me as long as not trimmed. Thanks for looking. 

Chris

Hi Chris,

I have several dozen ungraded cards that can be seen here:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=337407[/url]

I am most interested in your two AB's.  I f we can work something out for them, I'd also consider Leifield and Hinchman.

Thanks.

Doug
